CustomField.description:
Defaults to 'EVENT_BUS'. This controls the default save method used by Logger when calling saveLog().
Possible values: EVENT_BUS QUEUEABLE REST
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Defaults to 'EVENT_BUS'. This controls the default save method used by Logger when calling saveLog().
Possible values: EVENT_BUS QUEUEABLE REST
CustomField.label: Save Method
